rule: The next line must begin with the label "People names:" followed by a list of people names extracted from the input text in a comma-separated format.
input: The collaboration between Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos was unexpected.

validityText:

The input refers to a collaboration between them, which can be considered a specific topic relevant to the content of the text. The input does not violate any aspects of the given specification.
